name: Alien Ragdoll Playground
description:
Alien Playground is new addictive game, try to create aliens and play with it.
There is so many funny stuffs that you can use for your alien.
All you need is to drag and create a stuff you like, and the fun can begin.

Start to create people in alien playground and have a fun to killing it.
Peoples in playground is funny ragdoll humans, you can moving people where you want, just play with it.

In this ragdoll game is need to make a system with so many stuffs, you have to type of people aliens, but some alien is harder to kill, you can make very good people on the playground with a lot of machines around you.

Feature:
- Alien physics ragdoll game
- So many guns
- Perfect sounds
- Great graphics and animations
- So many traps
- Making aliens in people

Do not wait, go in Alien Ragdoll Playground adventures and have a fun.
If you have any question please contact us on mail.
Enjoy the game!
